com.rtrk.adapter

Class ProtobufAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rtrk.adapter.ProtobufAdapter

  • public class ProtobufAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    djekanovic Utility class for AT command encoding and decoding. The class conatins static methods for converting between String and Protobuf AT command format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProtobufAdapter()

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public static byte[] encode(byte[] commandByteArray,
                            java.io.File commandDescription)
        Translate from Protobuf format to String format using a specific description of message. The method uses XML file which contains description of specific AT command.
        Parameters:
        commandByteArray - AT command in Protobuf format which receives as byte array
        commandDescription - XML file which contains description of AT command
        Returns:
        AT command in String format as byte array

      • decode

        public static byte[] decode(byte[] commandByteArray,
                            java.io.File commandDescription)
        Translate from String format to Protobuf format using a specific description of message. The method uses XML file which contains description of specific AT command.
        Parameters:
        commandByteArray - AT command in String format which receives as byte array
        commandDescription - XML file which contains description of AT command
        Returns:
        AT command in Protobuf format as byte array
